item.title: [PI] Making a teleport timed
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

After players use the revenant teleport scroll that I have made, I want them to automatically teleport to Edge home after 30 minutes has run out.

This is the scrolls code in ItemClick.java:

//Revenants Scroll by Cloudnine
if (itemId == 608) {
	c.sendMessage("The scroll has brought you to the Revenants.");
	c.sendMessage("They are very ghastly, powerful, undead creatures.");
	c.sendMessage("If you defeat them, you may receive astounding treasures.");
	c.sendMessage("If you donate you may visit the Revenants anytime without a scroll.");
	c.getPA().movePlayer(3668, 3497, 0);
	c.gfx0(398);
	c.getItems().deleteItem(608, 1);
}

My base: [PI] Insanity X

What Iâ€™m asking for: A teleport that is triggered 30 minutes after using a specific item

Why: So that my players can go buy/sell Revenant Scrolls so they can go fight Revenants for good PvP drops. The timed thing is a good add-on that I would like to make the scroll more valued.

Thanks! I hope you can help, if not, thanks for reading anyways!

Read full topic
